Question
========

A person achieves a score of 12.2 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 8.2 with a standard deviation 1.1. The z-score of the person with 12.2 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 3.47
* 3.64
* 4.02

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 3.47: Incorrect
* 3.64: Correct
* 4.02: Incorrect
